g.text: TrafficManager
UC101 - Import Ships
UC102 - Search the details of a ship
UC103 - The positional messages temporally organized and associated with each of the ships
UC104 - Make a Summary of a ship's movements
UC105 - List for all ships the MMSI, the total number of movements, Travelled Distance and Delta Distance

UC106 - Get the top-N ships with the most kilometres travelled and their average speed Develop the data model required to support all the functionality and to fulfill the purpose of the system to develop
UC107 - return pairs of ships with routes with close departure/arrival coordinates and with different Travelled Distance.
ProjectManager
UC108 - develop the data model required to support all the functionality and to fulfill the purpose of the system to develop.
UC109 - draft an SQL script to test whether the database verifies all the data integrity restrictions that are required to fulfil the purpose of the system and the business constraints of the UoD
UC110 - the team to define the naming conventions to apply when defining identifiers or writing SQL or PL/SQL code
UC111 - create a SQL script to load the database with a minimum set of data sufficient to carry out data integrity verification and functionaltesting
PortManager
UC201 - As a Port manager, I which to import ports from a text file and create a 2D-tree with port locations
UC202 - As a Traffic manager, I which to find the closest port of a ship given its CallSign, on a certain DateTime

UC203 - As a Project Manager, I want the team to review the relational data model in view of the new user stories so it can support all the requirements to fulfil the purpose of the system being developed
Client
UC204 - As a Client, I want to know the current situation of a specific container being used to transport my goods
ShipCaptain
UC205 - As Ship Captain, I want the list of containers to be offloaded in the next port, including container identifier, type, position, and load
UC206 - As Ship Captain, I want the list of containers to be loaded in the next port, including container identifier, type, and load
UC207 - As Ship Captain, I want to know how many cargo manifests I have transported during a given year and the average number of containers per manifest
UC208 - As Ship Captain, I want to know the occupancy rate of a given ship for a given cargo manifest
UC209 - As Ship Captain, I want to know the occupancy rate of a given ship at a given moment
UC210 - As Traffic manager, I need to know which ships will be available on Monday next week and their location
